text: ineho inanite ineziya yemitiweduwachewi nachihu፡፡ (inesu) gini ayiweduwachihumi፡፡ bemets’ihafumi behulumi taminalachihu፡፡ bagenyuwachihumi gize «aminenali» yilalu፡፡ bagelelumi gize kek’uch’itachewi yetenesa be’inanite layi ‘ats’ik’ochachewini yinekisalu፡፡ «bek’uch’itachihu mutu፤ alahi libochi yek’wat’erutini ‘awak’i newina» belachewi፡፡
